title: (Optional) Add mini program members
content:
# (Optional) Add mini program members

2022-07-07 17:08

This topic describes the steps of the task to add members to a mini program. After creating the mini program, developer admins invite related developers to become members and add them to the mini program.

## Procedures

To add members to a mini program, you can follow the corresponding steps as below:

### Step 1: Navigate to Members tab

Click **Mini Program** on the navigation panel to the left to check the mini program list.![image](https://yuque.antfin.com/images/lark/0/2021/png/5956329/1634191477103-befa6ec6-fc1a-42e3-8eca-5048fba40786.png)

Click the name of the newly created mini program and then navigate to **Members** tab.![image](https://yuque.antfin.com/images/lark/0/2021/png/5956329/1634191703788-600ecb1d-d284-451a-8012-aee632acb060.png)

### Step 2: Add members

Click **\+ New member**, you can see all workspace members on the new member list. Select the workspace member you want and add the member to the mini program and click **Save**.![image](https://yuque.antfin.com/images/lark/0/2021/png/5956329/1634191967345-7dd29e2f-4b75-4dec-b3bc-f5837a18c788.png)

The workspace member will join to manage the mini program as a developer automatically.

> **Note**: The workspace member who creates the mini program will be set as an admin of the mini program automatically.

![image](https://yuque.antfin.com/images/lark/0/2021/png/5956329/1634192137548-0e969a3a-496c-4a79-8566-6f23aec50297.png)

You can change roles for the workspace member by clicking **Set As** and choose the mini program member role you want to assign to the workspace member. If you do not want the workspace member to manage the mini program, click **Delete** to remove the member from this mini program.![image](https://yuque.antfin.com/images/lark/0/2021/png/5956329/1634192239281-d4b995bc-b905-419b-98d7-67d39792e003.png)

Now you have completed adding members for a mini program.

## Next steps

[Upload mini programs](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/platform/upload)

[Configure mini programs](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/platform/configure)

[Release mini programs](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/platform/release)

[Generate QR codes](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/platform/generate-qrcode)

[Remove mini programs](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/platform/remove)
